links.href: images/pictures/EXTRACTING RESIDENTIAL REAL ESTATE ATTRIBUTES IN THE DA NANG MARKET USING THE PHOBERT MODEL.pdf

en.title: Research Thesis: Application of PhoBERT in the Real Estate Attribute Extraction Process - Case Study in Da Nang Market
en.text: Combine NLP model and rules for components: spam post classification, information extraction, information normalization. Components applied by the model will be tested on different methods (Focal loss, Dice loss, Intrust loss, Data Augmentation)

links.href: images/pictures/IMPROVING CUSTOMER LOYALTY OF A VIETNAMESE FASHION BRAND BASED ON CLV.pdf

en.title: IMPROVING CUSTOMER LOYALTY OF A VIETNAMESE FASHION BRAND BASED ON CLV
en.text: In this report, I have outlined a method for customer segmentation using unsupervised learning algorithms, combined with hierarchical analysis, to identify customer lifetime value (CLV) and assign descriptive names to each cluster. I also highlighted the challenges and opportunities the business is facing through a flowchart illustrating customer segment transitions.
